name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Midoriya My Hero Academia Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser with the heroic spirit of Izuku Midoriya from My Hero Academia using this inspiring Chrome extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Featuring a live wallpaper of Midoriya, this extension brings his unwavering determination and courage to your new tab, reminding you of his journey to becoming the world’s greatest hero.

Features:
🎨 High-quality live wallpaper of Izuku Midoriya from My Hero Academia.
🌐 Customizable search bar to use your preferred search engine.
🕒 Clock and date display for a functional and stylish browsing experience.
🔗 Quick-access shortcuts to your favorite websites.
Let Midoriya’s relentless courage and growth as a hero motivate you every time you open a new tab. Ideal for My Hero Academia fans who admire his character development and heroic aspirations.

More extensions: https://gameograf.com/
Contact us: https://gameograf.com/contact-us/
Privacy policy: https://gameograf.com/privacy-policy/
